hotels.title: Stylish Gatwick Airport Escape Just 30 Minutes from London
hotels.description: Refresh and recharge at Crowne Plaza London Gatwick Airport, an IHG Hotel, a stylish retreat located just a five-minute drive from London's Gatwick Airport. Home to a collection of contemporary rooms, the delicious Cube restaurant serving dishes made with locally-sourced ingredients and the trendy Bar 92, this hotel offers everything you need for a comfortable layover. Got time to explore? Hop on the Thameslink at Gatwick Airport and find yourself surrounded by the icons of London in just 30 minutes.

hotels.title: London Gatwick Airport North Terminal Stay with Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Step into refined French-inspired elegance just moments from Gatwick’s North Terminal in this refined airport stay. Find an oasis of calm amid the energy of one of the world's busiest airports and wake up well rested for the next leg of your journey. Savor exquisite Mediterranean cuisine at Vivre or enjoy vibrant Pan-Asian flavours at Vanda Restaurant. Sip a signature cocktail at La Terrasse, then stroll through the glass atrium to the covered walkway connecting directly to the airport. The nearby South Downs National Park and Hever Castle are easily reached for those seeking a taste of England’s countryside and heritage.
